privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how Cap2Cal protects your privacy and handles your data

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Capture2Calendar ("Cap2Cal", "we", "us", or "our"), we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you use our mobile application and web services (collectively, the "Service"). By using Cap2Cal, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

principles.title: Our Privacy Principles
principles.content: We believe in privacy by design. Your event data is stored locally on your device by default, and we only process the minimum data necessary to provide our AI-powered event extraction service. You maintain full control over your data at all times.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.intro: We collect and process the following types of information:

account.title: Account Information
account.content: When you create an account, we collect your email address and authentication credentials. We use Firebase Authentication to securely manage user accounts.

images.title: Event Images
images.content: Photos or screenshots of event posters that you capture using the app. These images are processed by our AI service (powered by Google Gemini) to extract event details. Images are temporarily stored during processing and are not permanently retained on our servers unless you explicitly enable cloud sync.

events.title: Event Data
events.content: Extracted event information including event name, date, time, location, description, and ticket links. This data is stored locally on your device by default and synced to your chosen calendar application.

usage.title: Usage Analytics
usage.content: We collect anonymized usage data through Google Analytics (for mobile app) and PostHog (for website only) to understand how users interact with our services, including feature usage, navigation patterns, and performance metrics. This helps us improve the Service and user experience.

technical.title: Technical Information
technical.content: Device type, operating system version, app version, IP address, browser type, and general location (country/region) for service optimization and security purposes.

subscription.title: Subscription and Payment Information
subscription.content: If you purchase a premium subscription, payment processing is handled securely by RevenueCat and the respective app store (Apple App Store or Google Play Store). We do not store your payment card information. We receive only subscription status and transaction identifiers.

calendar.title: Calendar Access
calendar.content: With your explicit permission, we access your device calendar to add extracted events. We only write data to your calendar and do not read or access existing calendar events.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

list.provide: To provide and maintain our Service, including AI-powered event extraction and calendar integration
list.process: To process event images using our AI models and extract event details with high accuracy
list.improve: To analyze usage patterns and improve our Service, fix bugs, and develop new features
list.communicate: To send you service-related notifications, updates, and respond to your inquiries
list.security: To monitor for suspicious activity, prevent fraud, and ensure the security of our Service
list.personalize: To personalize your experience and remember your preferences
list.comply: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service

aiProcessing.title: AI Processing and Data Handling
aiProcessing.content: When you capture an event poster, the image is sent to Google Gemini AI for processing. Google may temporarily store images for processing purposes in accordance with their privacy policies. We have data processing agreements in place requiring these providers to protect your data and not use it for training their models. Processed images are automatically deleted from our systems within 24 hours unless you opt into cloud backup.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Location
dataStorage.content: Your event data is primarily stored locally on your device. If you enable cloud sync, your data is stored in secure Firebase Cloud Firestore servers located in the United States and Europe (depending on your location). All data in transit is encrypted using industry-standard TLS protocols, and data at rest is encrypted using AES-256 encryption.

sharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

providers.title: Service Providers
providers.content: We work with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our Service: Firebase (authentication, database, hosting), Google Gemini (AI processing), RevenueCat (subscription management), Google Analytics (mobile app analytics), and PostHog (website analytics). These providers are contractually obligated to protect your data and use it only for the purposes we specify.

calendar.title: Calendar Services
calendar.content: When you add events to your calendar, event data is shared with your chosen calendar provider (Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, etc.) according to their respective privacy policies.

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.content: We may disclose your information if required by law, court order, or government request, or to protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users or the public.

business.title: Business Transfers
business.content: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the acquiring entity. We will notify you via email or prominent notice in the app before your data is transferred.

consent.title: With Your Consent
consent.content: We may share your information for any other purpose with your explicit consent.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. Account information is retained until you delete your account. Event images sent for AI processing are deleted within 24 hours. Usage analytics data is retained for up to 2 years in anonymized form. You can delete your locally stored event data at any time through the app settings.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption in transit (TLS 1.3), encryption at rest (AES-256), secure authentication (Firebase Auth with OAuth 2.0), regular security audits and penetration testing, access controls and monitoring, and secure API communications. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

list.access: Access: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
list.correct: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
list.delete: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information and account ("right to be forgotten")
list.restrict: Restriction: Request restriction of processing of your personal information
list.portability: Data Portability: Request a copy of your data in a structured, machine-readable format
list.object: Object: Object to our processing of your personal information
list.withdraw: Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time where we rely on consent to process your data
list.complaint: Complaint: Lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority

rights.exercise: To exercise these rights, please contact us at hi@cap2cal.app. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: Our website uses essential cookies for functionality and analytics cookies (via PostHog) to understand user behavior. We do not use advertising or tracking cookies. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: Our Service integrates with the following third-party services, each with their own privacy policies:

list.firebase: Firebase (Google): Authentication, database, and hosting - privacy.google.com
list.gemini: Google Gemini: AI-powered image analysis and event extraction - ai.google.dev/gemini-api/terms
list.analytics: Google Analytics: Mobile app usage analytics - policies.google.com/privacy
list.revenuecat: RevenueCat: Subscription and payment management - revenuecat.com/privacy
list.apple: Apple: Calendar integration and App Store payments - apple.com/legal/privacy
list.google: Google: Calendar integration and Play Store payments - policies.google.com/privacy

thirdParty.responsibility: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third-party services. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence, including the United States. These countries may have data protection laws that differ from your jurisdiction. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, including Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission for transfers from the EU/EEA.

california.title: California Privacy Rights (CCPA)
california.content: If you are a California resident, you have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), including the right to know what personal information we collect, the right to delete personal information, the right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (note: we do not sell your information), and the right to non-discrimination for exercising your CCPA rights. California residents can exercise these rights by contacting hi@cap2cal.app.

gdpr.title: European Privacy Rights (GDPR)
gdpr.content: If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), United Kingdom, or Switzerland, you have rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Our legal basis for processing your data includes: contract performance (to provide our Service), legitimate interests (to improve our Service and prevent fraud), consent (for optional features like analytics), and legal obligations (to comply with applicable laws). You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local supervisory authority.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our Service is not intended for children under the age of 13 (or 16 in the EEA). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately, and we will delete such information from our systems.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or other factors. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. For significant changes, we will provide prominent notice through the app or via email. Your continued use of the Service after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
contact.address: For data protection inquiries, you may also write to our Data Protection Officer at the email address above.

If you are under 18, you represent that you have obtained permission from your parent or legal guardian to use the Service. By using the Service, you represent and warrant that you meet these eligibility requirements and have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms.

description.content: Cap2Cal is an AI-powered mobile and web application that allows users to capture photos of event posters, flyers, and tickets, extract event information using artificial intelligence, and automatically add events to calendar applications. The Service includes: event image capture and processing, AI-powered data extraction, calendar integration with Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook, and other calendar services, local and cloud storage of event data, event library and favorites management, ticket link detection, and sharing functionality. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the Service at any time with or without notice.

aiService.title: 6. AI-Powered Features and Accuracy
aiService.content: Our Service uses artificial intelligence to extract event information from images. While we strive for high accuracy (approximately 99%), AI-generated results may occasionally contain errors or inaccuracies. You acknowledge and agree that: AI extraction results are provided "as-is" and may require manual verification, we do not guarantee 100% accuracy of extracted event details, you are responsible for reviewing and confirming event information before adding it to your calendar, we are not liable for any missed events, incorrect dates, or other errors resulting from AI inaccuracies. We encourage you to verify important event details with the official event source.

This includes processing images through our AI service providers. You represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary rights to all User Content and that your User Content does not violate any third-party rights or applicable laws.

free.title: Free Service
free.content: Cap2Cal currently offers its core features free of charge. We reserve the right to introduce paid subscription tiers in the future with advanced features.

premium.title: Premium Subscriptions
premium.content: If you purchase a premium subscription: Subscription fees are charged through the Apple App Store or Google Play Store and are subject to their respective payment terms. Subscriptions automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You may cancel your subscription at any time through your app store account settings. Refunds are handled according to Apple and Google's refund policies. We reserve the right to change subscription pricing with advance notice to existing subscribers. We may offer promotional pricing or free trials, which may be subject to additional terms.

calendar.title: 9. Calendar Integration and Third-Party Services
calendar.content: The Service integrates with third-party calendar applications and services. You acknowledge that: Calendar integrations are provided "as-is" and depend on third-party APIs and services. We are not responsible for changes, interruptions, or discontinuation of third-party calendar services. You must comply with the terms of service of your chosen calendar provider. We are not liable for any data loss, synchronization errors, or conflicts with third-party calendar services. Your use of third-party services is subject to their respective privacy policies and terms of service.

dataAndPrivacy.title: 10. Data and Privacy
dataAndPrivacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection, use, and protection of your personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference. By using the Service, you consent to our data practices as described in the Privacy Policy. Key points include: Event images are processed by AI service providers and deleted within 24 hours. Event data is stored locally on your device by default. Cloud sync is optional and can be disabled at any time. You can delete your account and data at any time. Please review our Privacy Policy for complete details.

limits.title: 11. Usage Limits and Restrictions
limits.content: We may impose reasonable usage limits to ensure fair access and optimal performance for all users. These limits may include: Number of event captures per day or month, maximum image file size for processing, API rate limits for calendar integration, and storage limits for cloud-synced data. Free tier users may have different limits than premium subscribers. We reserve the right to modify these limits at any time. Users who exceed limits may experience temporary service restrictions.

byUser.title: Termination by You
byUser.content: You may terminate your account at any time through the app settings. Upon termination, your account access will be immediately revoked, and your cloud-stored data will be deleted within 30 days. Locally stored data on your device will remain until you manually delete the app.

byUs.title: Termination by Us
byUs.content: We may suspend or terminate your account immediately, without notice, if you violate these Terms, engage in fraudulent activity, abuse the Service, pose a security risk, or request account deletion. Upon termination by us, you must immediately cease using the Service. Provisions that by their nature should survive termination (including intellectual property rights, disclaimers, and limitations of liability) will remain in effect.

warranty.title: 13. Disclaimers and Warranties
warranty.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, OR COURSE OF PERFORMANCE. IN NO EVENT SHALL OUR TOTAL LIABILITY EXCEED THE AMOUNT YOU PAID US IN THE PAST SIX MONTHS, OR $100, WHICHEVER IS LESS.
